posts.post_title: FS: Group of Eight T 206 cards
posts.post_content:
Here is a grouping of 8 T206 cards, 4 out of the 8 are in nice shape, some have creases...color on all are good and no paper loss.
Top Row(L-R) McAleese, Thomas, Pfeister, and Downey
Bottom Row(L-R) Hummel, Milan,MitchellSOLD, and "Doc" AdkinsSOLD
